original_text: For, as I have often told you before and now tell you again even with tears, many live as enemies of the cross of Christ.
korean_text: 내가 여러 번 너희에게 말하였거니와 이제도 눈물을 흘리며 말하노니 여러 사람들이 그리스도의 십자가의 원수로 행하느니라

sentences.original_text: For, as I have often told you before
and now tell you again even with tears
sentences.korean_translation: 이제 눈물을 흘리며 다시 너희에게 말하지만
